Articles.Content: I'm really hoping for amnesia sometimes late this year so i can play kerbal for the first time again, once it is complete. What a weird thing alpha/beta gaming has done to me...

Who knows? Maybe the full game will be so different that it will feel like that.

I doubt it however.

Welp, time to go stick myself in a coma for a year and a half.

Just slam your head into your desk really really hard. If you don't kill yourself you certainly won't remember a thing!

Please don't do this. You'll just end up hurting yourself.
